tool_description: AI Powered API to generate a QR Code with logo and colors. Specialized Qdot format for global compatability and extra small sizing is EXCLUSIVE to our service. QR Codes are generated in high quality for print and other use cases such as t-shirts, stickers, etc.
name: QRGen
title: QRGen

api_list.name: GenQR
api_list.description: This API allows you to create QR code. The API will return PNG directly.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The content of your QR code such as a URL, text or any other text-based formats that work with QR Codes. String should be URL encoded.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Size of the output image in pixels. Max: 1000 Default: 500
